header_text: You're at a dinner party with your dearest friends. You get a plate for food and on your way over to the dining table, you drop your plate on the floor. Two of your friends start running over to help you, but they look concerned.

elements.Text: Do your friends feel frustrated with you for dropping your dinner plate?

elements.name: You're at a dinner party with your dearest friends. You get a plate for food and on your way over to the dining table, you drop your plate on the floor. Two of your friends start running over to help you, but they look concerned._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
